What can this bear do for you?

For Parents

Complete online nutrition questionnaires and get immediate feedback. Learn more

For Community Providers

Organize community agency activities for nutrition risk screening. Learn more

For Primary Care Providers

Supporting your clients with young children to identify potential nutrition risks with screening questionnaires. Learn more

Free access to questionnaires.

Please select the questionnaire that best fits you.

Learn how to acquire a free license for the paper-based NutriSTEP® questionnaires that you can use in your practice.

Get Started

Access toddler and preschooler questionnaires online at www.nutritionscreen.ca.
